dc:title: May Day -- 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Expresses deep gratitude for Peter Maurin's vision and life. Intermingles appreciations of Peter and St. Joseph's gifts to the works of the CW.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 704 1956-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
